report.title: UKBMS Year Plot Index report
report.description: UKBMS specific, for use with the Year by Year plot form: gives year index values using ukbms_year_index_values data.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM ukbms_year_index_values yiv JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl ON yiv.taxa_taxon_list_id = cttl.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT taxon_meaning_id, string_agg(taxon, ',' ORDER BY id) combined FROM cache_taxa_taxon_lists WHERE language_iso = '#language_iso#' AND preferred = false AND taxon_list_id in (#taxon_list_id#) GROUP BY taxon_meaning_id) common ON common.taxon_meaning_id = cttl.taxon_meaning_id #joins# WHERE yiv.location_id = #location_id#

param.name: location_id
param.description: Enter the ID of the location

param.name: country_id
param.description: Enter the Indicia ID of the country

param.name: language_iso
param.description: Enter the Indicia ID of the country
